title: With Urgot being my favorite champion, may I make a small request?
body: I know Urgot will receive a rework eventually, and that I am very ok with, but when Urgot gets his rework, can he keep his weird ability names? They are easily my favorite part of the champion because its fun to be talking to my friends, and bring up "Zaun touched bolt augmenter" or "hyper kinetic position reverser." these abilities are fun to say, and are some of the few abilities I can actually remember the name of off the top of my head.
